sub_title: Senior Product Operations Manager, Tech at Uber
summary:
Senior Program Operations Manager focusing on Dynamic Pricing and Matching within Uber's Product team. I focus on defining and executing operating structures and processes to implement our product strategy globally

Experienced in building businesses from the ground up into mature and sustainable entities. Helped scale Uber in Pakistan immediately after its launch. I was responsible for Uber's marketplace operations in the country as the Marketplace Lead for Pakistan prior to joining Uber's Europe Middle East and Africa mega-region's Central Operations team in Amsterdam where I focused on improving efficiency by delivering high impact execution at scale for Uber's Rides products across EMEA in the domains of Marketplace Health, Pricing and as a Market Rep for key business regions in EMEA

Former Senior Associate, with Junior Engagement Manager experience, in McKinsey's Middle East Office serving clients in Telecommunication, Real Estate, FMCGs and Financial Institutions sectors in GCC and Pakistan

Expertise in operations management, strategy design, project management and talent management across multiple industries

Speaks fluent English, Urdu/Hindi and Punjabi

education.grade: Graduated with Distinction. Ranked third in the class of 2012

awards.title: Founder, LUMS Student Council
awards.description: Lobbied with various stakeholders for the creation of a representative body for students and elected to the constituent assembly. Drew up the constitution and oversaw the first two elections of the LUMS Student Council (Academic years 2006-2007 and 2007-2008)

awards.title: Academic honors
awards.description:
Merit Scholar, Suleman Dawood School of Business, Lahore University of Management Sciences (2011)

HEC-USAID Scholar, School of Humanities and Social Sciences, Lahore University of Management Sciences (2005-2008)

First position in Aitchison College Lahore, UCLES A Levels batch (2004)

projects.title: Sales-Force Management Course Project - Mobilink PMCL Enterprise Solutions
projects.description:
•	Mapped out the whole Sales process
•	Identified the bottlenecks in the current process
•	Identified the methods to boost sales-force morale
•	Identified methods to monitor the sales pipeline more efficiently
•	Presented suggestions to the Sales-force Regional Manager

contributors.headline: Senior Product Operations Manager, Tech at Uber
QA Analyst | CRM, DCC Gateway, & Field Service Management | SMS Plc.

projects.title: AkzoNobel Pakistan Decorative Paints Business (Channel Optimization)
projects.description: This project involved a study of the unique hybrid retailer distribution channel at AkzoNobel paints business. After an in-depth analysis of channel design, incentive structures, and control processes; we identified potential causes of channel conflicts, recommended loyalty and incentive programs for untouched important channel actors in the sales process.

contributors.headline: Senior Product Operations Manager, Tech at Uber
Advisor | $110MM+ annual spend | Process Excellence | LUMS
Assistant Marketing Lead at Intech Process Automation

projects.title: Sialkot International Airport Limited (SIAL)
projects.description: SIAL is the only privately owned airport in Pakistan and represents an investment in excess of PKR 4.8 Billion. We consulted with SIAL as part of our MBA project. Our objectives were identifying strategies for revenue maximization (through improved segmentation) and operational optimization. The project delivered projected value of PKR 80 Million per annum out of which PKR 15 Million has already been realized.

projects.title: Mobilink (PMCL) Enterprise Solutions (ES) Salesforce Optimization Project
projects.description: This project examined the ES sales process and identified steps to improve visibility and sales yield through improved pipeline management and alignment of incentive structures for permanent and contract staff.

profile_positions.description: Supporting the Dynamic Pricing and Matching teams within Uber's Marketplace Product team to: define the operating structure and processes to implement and scale product strategy; facilitate regular communications on product vision and progress; advise Product teams throughout the product life cycle on the business implications and global feasibility of the product portfolio; develop an end-to-end product business plan, and project-manage Ops teams on implementation; ensure functional stakeholders (Legal, Tax, Policy, etc.) are aligned; track core business metrics and identify key problem areas and/or geographies; and surface + advocate for key insights from the business to advise product improvement
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Operations Manager, Tech

profile_positions.description:
Senior Central Operations Manager for Uber's Europe Middle East and Africa (EMEA) mega-region. I focused on maximizing the health of Uber's marketplace and driving growth for the EMEA Rides Business by leading high-impact projects in the following domains:
•	Central Ops Market Rep for Southern Europe and Central Eastern Europe: Lead projects on pricing changes, geo-expansion, incentive allocation and budgeting that have directly helped our business goals in these regions
•	Support product teams for Marketplace, Surge and Matching: Serve as the first line of support,  channel feedback and suggestions for these products after validation; identify and build EMEA specific processes or guardrails where needed
•	Marketplace Health: Continued refining and expanding the frameworks that underpin our EMEA health tools and processes
profile_positions.title: Senior Central Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: Regional Operations Manager for Uber's Europe Middle East and Africa mega-region. I focused on projects aimed at maximizing marketplace performance that could be scaled across EMEA in the following three domains: Marketplace Health (definition and assessment), Pricing and use of remote teams to centralize execution of sensitive processes
profile_positions.title: Regional Operations Manager EMEA

profile_positions.description:
As the Marketplace Lead for Pakistan, I was responsible for the entire lifecycle experience for Partner Drivers with Uber.
I joined Uber Pakistan immediately after its launch in Lahore, the first city for Uber in Pakistan and helped scale the business fast enough for Pakistan to be declared an independent sub-region. As of October 2017, Uber is present in 6 cities in Pakistan. This involved everything from analytics to on-the-ground execution including getting our first Greenlight Hub built and managing  large teams
profile_positions.title: Operations and Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
Joined the firm as a Junior Associate and left as a Junior Engagement Manager. Primarily served Telecommunications, Power and Financial Institutions clients in the following functional domains with illustrative projects:

Strategy design:
-Created the long-term enterprise strategy of a leading regional telecom player based on detailed market sizing of ICT segments; identification of where-to-play based on expert and customer inputs; and identification of suitable partners to fully operationalize the strategy
-Made an aggressive growth-oriented 5-year business plan for a large real estate company by identifying levers for accelerating existing revenue streams; optimizing resource allocation based on normalized returns and adjacent new-growth opportunities
-Created the long-term Enterprise ICT strategy of a leading regional telecom player; made an aggressive growth-oriented 5-year business plan for a large real estate company and designed a business-unit-level strategy for a regional bank 

Project management:
-Designed, launched and scaled up a new operating model for a telecom enterprise sales channel under very tight deadlines with direct operational responsibility over client team members and successfully handed over to client counterpart. Sales throughput is 2.5X of previous operating model with stronger controls
-Launched new telecom brand in Middle East by leading all planning and coordination with 10+ vendors for allocation of scarce resources and ordering of schedules with successful handover to client team

Talent management:
-Led the design of an integrated talent management strategy for a vertically integrated utility with 30,000+ employees by defining relevant employee groups; creating integrated career paths for each group; defining training requirements consisting of class room learning, on-the job learning and individual guidance based on best practices and expert input
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.description: SIAL is the only privately owned airport in Pakistan and represents an investment in excess of PKR 4.8 Billion. As part of my MBA Project, I led a team that worked with SIAL. Our objectives were identifying strategies for revenue maximization (through improved segmentation) and operational optimization. The project delivered projected value of PKR 80 Million per annum out of which PKR 15 Million has already been realized.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: Worked with management to improve visibility and efficiency of core production processes.
profile_positions.title: Intern - Production and Operations Management

profile_positions.description: I designed and implemented an econometric model for scoring Mortgage Loan customers using 12 different variables. These scores were applied to arrive at a Risk Adjusted ENR for the portfolio with excellent predictive power of the changes that could be expected in payment behavior and hence risk, over a six month time horizon given a change in any of the 12 variables considered. The model was statistically robust.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager - Risk Analytics

profile_positions.description: Oversaw a growth in Islamic Deposits of more than 75% in 18 months while working as the Assistant Product Manager – Islamic Liabilities. I was responsible for the pricing and stable operation of all Islamic deposit products and involved in all marketing and deposit-generating activities.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Product Manager - Islamic Liabilities
